results.title: Starting Crochet
results.creator_credit: Maggie Clarke, Pat Marshall and MSI Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Joy for Life”.
Crochet is a soothing, rhythmic craft, practised throughout the world for thousands of years - using only a hook and a length of thread. This video and its accompanying booklet will show you how to begin, the materials you need, how to work some basic stitches; as well as some attractive items which are easy to make. Introduced by Hannah Gordon.

group_works.title: Telestreet: the Italian Media Jacking Movement

results.title: Top shelf
results.brief_description: This stylish short animation borrows from the tradition of nastier fairytales. This creepy cautionary fable outlines what can happen to little girls who whine for toys.

results.title: Starting Tapestry (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Maggie Clarke, Pat Marshall and MSI Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Joy for Life”.
There is a wonderfully rich variety of tapestry styles throughout the world and the techniques are easy to learn at any age. “Starting tapestry” will show you the materials you need, how to work some basic stitches and some attractive items which are easy to make. Hannah Gordon introduces the many possibilities tapestry offers to everyone, young and old.

results.title: Telestreet: the Italian Media Jacking Movement
results.brief_description: “Telestreet” is a network of pirate micro TV transmitters set up by media activists across Italy. Since beginning in June 2002 there are now almost 200 stations throughout the country. This documentary contains interviews with some of those media activists.
results.description: “Telestreet” is a network of pirate micro TV transmitters set up by media activists across Italy. Since beginning in June 2002 there are now almost 200 stations throughout the country. This documentary contains interviews with some of those media activists.

results.title: Starting Embroidery (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Maggie Clarke, Pat Marshall and MSI Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Joy for Life”.
There are many beautiful and fascinating styles of embroidery practised around the world. “Starting embroidery” will show you the materials you need, how to work some basic stitches and some attractive items which are easy to make. Hannah Gordon introduces the many possibilities embroidery offers to everyone, young and old.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Maggie Clarke, Pat Marshall and MSI Productions

results.title: Heaps good: Muph n Plutonic
results.brief_description: This music video featuring animation was made by Melbourne-based video artist and animator, Anto Skene. ‘Heaps Good’ is a track from the first collaboration of acclaimed Melbourne hip hop artist MC Muphin and one of Australia’s highest profile producers, Plutonic Lab. Quality local production featuring hot local sounds.
results.description: This music video featuring animation was made by Melbourne-based video artist and animator, Anto Skene. ‘Heaps Good’ is a track from the first collaboration of acclaimed Melbourne hip hop artist MC Muphin and one of Australia’s highest profile producers, Plutonic Lab. Quality local production featuring hot local sounds.
